Dayda

City of New York

This is a catalog of datasets organized and made more accessible from the City of New York, providing simple dowloadable CSV and JSON files, as well as Postman Collections you can use as part of workflows and other automation.

    Parks Trails

    Location of paths or trails in designated Forever Wild areas of NYC Parks.

    Parks Special Events

    Event and attendance information from special events facilitated by NYC Parks’ “Public Programs” division, including fitness, sports, dancing, movies, and concerts.
